memberdef.argsstring: (const char *program, uint32_t pid, const char *file, char **error)
memberdef.name: basic_init

briefdescription.para: Initialize the BASIC context with the provided program, console, process ID, and file.

parameterdescription.para: The console to use for input/output.
Pointer to store any error messages.

simplesect.para: A pointer to the initialized basic_ctx context.

briefdescription.para: Destroy the BASIC context and free associated resources.
Run the BASIC program by executing the next statement.
Check if the BASIC program has finished executing.

simplesect.para: True if the program has finished, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Jump to a specific line number in the BASIC program.

parameterdescription.para: The line number to jump to.

simplesect.para: True if the jump was successful, false if the line doesn't exist.

briefdescription.para: Parse and execute a line in the BASIC program.
Parse and execute a statement in the BASIC program.
Check if the expected token is the current token in the BASIC program.

simplesect.para: True if the token matches, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Parse function definitions in the BASIC program.

simplesect.para: True if the function definitions were parsed successfully, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Clone an existing BASIC context to create a new one.

simplesect.para: A new basic_ctx that is a clone of the original.

briefdescription.para: Set system variables in the BASIC context.
Check if a function name corresponds to a built-in string function.

detaileddescription.para:
fn_name
The name of the function to check.
ctx
The BASIC context.
res
Pointer to store the result of the function if found.
1 if the function is found and executed, 0 otherwise.
Check if a function name corresponds to a built-in string function.

parameterdescription.para: pointer to return value of function

briefdescription.para: Evaluate an integer function in the context of BASIC.

parameterdescription.para: The name of the function to evaluate.

simplesect.para: The evaluated integer result of the function.

briefdescription.para: Evaluate a double (floating-point) function in the context of BASIC.

parameterdescription.para: The name of the function to evaluate.
Pointer to store the evaluated result of the function.

briefdescription.para: Evaluate a string function in the context of BASIC.

parameterdescription.para: The name of the function to evaluate.

simplesect.para: The evaluated string result of the function.

briefdescription.para: Check if a function name corresponds to a built-in double (floating-point) function.

parameterdescription.para: The name of the function to check.
Pointer to store the result of the function if found.

simplesect.para: 1 if the function is found and executed, 0 otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Check if a function name corresponds to a built-in integer function.

detaileddescription.para:
fn_name
The name of the function to check.
ctx
The BASIC context.
res
Pointer to store the result of the function if found.
1 if the function is found and executed, 0 otherwise.
Check if a function name corresponds to a built-in integer function.

parameterdescription.para: pointer to return value of function

briefdescription.para: Find a function definition by name in the BASIC context.

parameterdescription.para: The name of the function to find.

simplesect.para: The function definition if found, NULL otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Initialize the local call stack for the current function or procedure.

detaileddescription.para:
ctx
The BASIC context.
Initialize the local call stack for the current function or procedure.

briefdescription.para: Free the local call stack and associated variables for the current function or procedure.

detaileddescription.para:
ctx
The BASIC context.
Free the local call stack and associated variables for the current function or procedure.

briefdescription.para: Check if a function name corresponds to a built-in double (floating-point) function.

parameterdescription.para: The name of the function to check.

simplesect.para: True if the function is a built-in double function, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Free function definitions and associated resources in the BASIC context.
Get the printable syntax of an expression in the BASIC program.

simplesect.para: The printable syntax as a string.

briefdescription.para: Handle the LIBRARY statement, which loads a library into the program.

detaileddescription.para:
ctx
The BASIC context.
Handle the LIBRARY statement, which loads a library into the program.

briefdescription.para: Functions related to BASIC context management, program execution, and function handling.
